[[module ListUsers users="."]]
[[module css]]
.textchange div.sitemember:nth-child(2) {
display:none;
}
.menu a:link{color: #EE82EE}
.menu a:newpage{color: #EE82EE}
.menu a:visited{color: #EE82EE}
.menu a:hover{color: #EE82EE}
a {
  color: #985836;
}
a:visited {
  color: #985836;
}
a.newpage {
  color: #985836;
}
div.colmod-block div.foldable-list-container a {
    color: #EE82EE;
}
.hovertip {
  border-radius: 0.5em;
  padding: 0.5em;
  width: 20em;
  z-index: 100;
}
#page-title {
  display: none
}
#side-bar a,
#side-bar a:visited {
  color: #985836;
}
#side-bar .side-block {
  border-color: #985836;
  border-width: 2px;
  box-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(235, 235, 235, 0.4);
}
#side-bar .side-block .heading {
  border-color: #985836;
  color: #985836;
}
#side-bar .collapsible-block-unfolded-link {
    border-bottom-color: #985836;
}
#side-bar .collapsible-block-unfolded-link .collapsible-block-link,
#side-bar .collapsible-block-unfolded-link .collapsible-block-link:hover {
    color: #985836;
}
.side-block .menu-item > .image {
  filter: brightness(1.5);
}
.side-block[style*="background-color"] .menu-item > .image {
  filter: brightness(1.1);
}
#side-bar .side-block[style*="background-color"] {
}
@media (max-width: 767px) {
  #side-bar {
    background-color: rgb(79, 67, 111);
  }
}
#top-bar a {
  color: #e6e6e6;
}
#top-bar ul li ul {
  border-color: #985836;
}
#top-bar ul li.sfhover a,
#top-bar ul li:hover a {
  color: #985836;
}
#top-bar ul li.sfhover ul li a,
#top-bar ul li:hover ul li a {
  border-top-color: #e6e6e6;
}
div#container-wrap {
  background-image: url('http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/or330/cafe-bg.png');
}
#header {
  background-image: url('http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/theme%3Anight-rush-theme/night-rush-icon.png')
}
body {
  background-color: #f6f6f6;
}
.notation {
    border-left: solid 3px rgb(30, 30, 30);
    border-right: solid 3px rgb(30, 30, 30);
    padding: 25px 25px 25px 25px;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    width: 75%;
    margin: auto;
    background: #f7f7f7;
}
